description: This file appears to be a shell script (.sh) defining utility functions for system information retrieval, logging, and device management tasks such as rebooting, uptime, IP address, MAC address, and handling core dumps. It includes sourced properties files and makes system calls.

methods.name: Timestamp
methods.description: Returns the current date and time in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format.

methods.name: resetRebootFlag
methods.description: Logs a reboot event and resets a specific reboot flag file.

methods.name: Uptime
methods.description: Returns system uptime in seconds by reading /proc/uptime.

methods.name: getIPAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the IP address of the device, handling both IPv4 and IPv6 scenarios based on presence of /tmp/estb_ipv6.

methods.name: getMacAddress
methods.description: Gets the MAC address of the device's interface.

methods.name: getMacAddressOnly
methods.description: Gets MAC address of the interface without colons.

methods.name: waitForDumpCompletion
methods.description: Waits for a core dump process to complete, with a maximum wait time.

methods.name: dumpInProcess
methods.description: Checks if a core dump process is currently ongoing.

methods.name: haveCoreToUpload
methods.description: Checks if there are core dump files available for upload.
